instruction: Saut√© the Aromatics: Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the chopped onion, minced garlic, and ginger. Cook until softened and fragrant, about 3-4 minutes.
Add Spices: Stir in the curry powder and cook for an additional minute, until fragrant.
Add Lentils and Broth: Add the red lentils and vegetable broth to the pot. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the lentils are tender.
Stir in Coconut Milk: Stir in the coconut milk and bring back to a simmer. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, or until the flavors have blended.
Add Vegetables: Add the spinach and frozen peas to the pot. Cook until the spinach is wilted and the peas are heated through, about 2-3 minutes.
Season and Serve: Season the curry with salt and black pepper to taste. Garnish with fresh cilantro, if desired. Serve hot with rice or naan bread.
